tool_description: Really simple API to retrieve Open Graph data from all sites without being blocked, even if it does not have Open Graph tags setup.Bundled with an Open Graph debugger and TailwindCSS snippets to create OpenGraph visualizations inside your webapp. Fast and trustworthy.
name: OpenGraphr
title: OpenGraphr

api_list.name: Extract Open Graph data
api_list.description: This endpoint will scrape an URL and extract all Open Graph related information.

optional_parameters.name: force
optional_parameters.description: If 1, forces refreshing the website URL (slower than returning the monthly cached data).

optional_parameters.name: tailgraph
optional_parameters.description: If equals to 1, then the API will generate an Open Graph image using TailGraph's free API in case the website does not provide an image.
